subtitle: A refreshing way to end a rich meal. Make these in advance and serve with clotted cream. Treat yourselves with a glass of Sangria and enjoy.

method.text: Place the water and sugar in a small pan. Heat gently without stirring for 2-3 min until sugar has melted. Bring to boil and simmer for 3-5 min until golden brown in colour.
Remove from heat. Stir in Cointreau. Leave to cool.
Arrange orange and kiwi slices on serving plates. Pour over the caramel syrup. Chill for 30 min before serving.

title: Boozy caramel oranges
